pr_title: FLEX-5298: Adds general interrogation functionality for lmds

timeline.message:
FLEX-5298: Adds general interrogation functionality for light
measurement devices. Furthermore, profiles are used to distinguish
between a default controlled station and a light measurement device.

FLEX-5298: Adds licence headers, reverts changes on property files of
the IEC61850 simulator

FLEX-5298: Fixes compile error; sets profile to
default_controlled_station.
FLEX-5298: Attempts to solve cucumber test.

FLEX-5298: Moves tests of default methods to separate test class. Moves
profile related test classes to another package.

timeline.bodyText: Complete the task associated to this TODO comment.
timeline.author: jenkins-ip-10-4-24-184

timeline.message: FLEX-5298: Adds a test to check the order of messages.
FLEX-5298: Adds more arguments to test.
FLEX-5298: Changes the cause of transmission.

timeline.author: rlemmers

timeline.bodyText: In the old situation, the casing of the openmuc library ("ASdu") was used. Changing to "Asdu" is fine, but only if we adapt all our class names.
timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText: I would prefer to use "Asdu" in our code.
replies.author: smvdheijden

replies.bodyText: Done: replaced ASdu by Asdu in our own code.
replies.author: rlemmers

timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText:
For an interrogation response this should indeed be CauseOfTransmission.INTERROGATED_BY_STATION.
The AsduType should also be changed accordingly, as the interrogation responses are without timestamp, so it should actually be ASduType.M_ME_NC_1 (measured value, short floating point value). Furthermore the timestamp parameter will no longer be needed after changing the AsduType (and the information elements within the ASdu).
replies.author: smvdheijden

replies.bodyText: Done. Because the timestamp is not needed, I could also remove some code.
replies.author: rlemmers

timeline.bodyText: ASdu handler -> Asdu or ASDU handler
timeline.author: smvdheijden

timeline.bodyText: ASdu handler -> Asdu or ASDU handler
timeline.author: smvdheijden
smvdheijden
